title: Richard Gere summoned to testify as Italy's leader goes on trial over stranded migrants
content:
1. Richard Gere summoned to testify as Italy's leader goes on trial over stranded migrants  CBS News

  3. Italy's Salvini in court for blocking Open Arms from docking  Al Jazeera English
  4. Matteo Salvini: Right-wing Italy politician on trial for blocking migrant boat  BBC News
  5. Salvini ridicules calling of Richard Gere to kidnapping trial  Reuters
